modName: Dark Crimson Dynasty Armor Skimpy version
summary: Modified, Dark Crimson version of the Armor from Dynasty White Armor - Skimpy and Super Skimpy by Simomax - Codecrackerx9 drakishar and ken1945, with Dark Crimson texture by Haldir307.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE 06 May 2012:

I have uploaded 3 Alternate Textures, namely Ebony Gold, Ebony Silver and plain Ebony (Black)


DISCLAIMER:

This modification is made with Haldir307's orginal Dark Crimson Texture.

I wasn't my initial intention to release a mod, but I was happy enough with my tinkering with the Dynasty White Armor Mod to want to share it with other like minded players.

By that I mean, I probably will not entertain requests as I am not sufficiently proficient as a modder - this stuff is mind boggling for me and I'm not going to start going thru all the tutorials any time soon.

NOTE:

This is NOT A STANDALONE Mod, you need to install the aforementioned Dynasty White Armor Skimpy and Super Skimpy Mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6983)

Also, this Armor is supposedly meant for CBBE v2, however, I did not encounter any issues using it in game with CBBE v3.

WHAT THIS MOD DOES:

1) Retextured the original White Armor to Dark Crimson (my own personal preference)

2) Tweaked the texture transparencies to modify the skimpiness of the armor

3) removed the butt-flaps

4) Remove the nipple slip (well, almost) by modifying the chest piece

Look at the the screenshots for a better idea of what to expect.

BEFORE INSTALLATION:

Please ensure you download and install the Dynasty White Armor Mod.

INSTALLATION:

Simply unzip into your Skyrim 'Data' Folder (usual procedure). The 'DYarmor' DDS file will overwrite the one from the Whilte Armor mod, so u may want to back that up.

HOW TO OBTAIN THE ARMOR:

I am not going to cut and paste entire paragraphs from the White Armor Mod Description, so please read it at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6983.

My mod only changes the default armor from that mod, the rest are unaffected (i think)

APOLOGIES:

I hereby admit that I could have tidied this thing up and bundled it more neatly with an esp file, removing the need to download the original White Armor Mod (but then, why not, its a great mod).

I may do that one day if I decide to download the Creation Kit and start to learn how to use it.

PERMISSIONS:

Go ahead and do anything you want with this DDS file. What I did with it is nothing compared to the work put into many other mods out there.
author: getcape
